vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Heber (H2268)(?), first mentioned at Gen.14.13
Also named: Hebraios<\i> (Ἑβραῖος "Hebrew" G1445)
§ Hebrew = "one from beyond"
n pr
1) a designation of the patriarchs and the Israelites
adj
2) a designation of the patriarchs and the Israelites
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a)   descendiente de Éber; (b)   descendiente de Merarí; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
希伯來 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 "來自遠處的人"
1)專有名詞
2)形容詞
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
希伯来 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 "来自远处的人"
1)专有名词
2)形容词
